question: I am 39 years old muslim lady, I dont know why my family had delayed my marriage till now.
answer:
QUESTION
I am doing job to earn for my living, no one is there to support me, as my parents have passed and my siblings are busy in their families. A person hs showed me his interest in me, but that would be his 2nd marriage which he doesnt want to disclose to his wife, my sister has refused to accept that proposal, I sometime get too frustrated and do things which are prohibited for muslims, like masturbation, and I repent myself and ask Allah for forgiveness. What shall I do please guide me as now I am tired of doing job and want to have a home and a loving husband who could take care of me, Shall I marry that person on my own. Please tell me some Dua'a to get married soon. I will be very much thankful to you Allah Hafiz
ANSWER
